availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lorenzo Hobbs Noble (Lebanon, Marion Co, Kentucky, attorney & commonwealth's atty)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, attorney and commonwealth's attorney. Paris, Maine, native. Son of Daniel Noble and Hannah Knight Noble. Married to Anne Alice Hogue Noble in Bardstown, Kentucky, on November 21, 1845. Father of Mary C. Noble, William P. Noble, Charles H. Noble, and Daniel A. Noble. Graduated from Harvard University in Cambridge, Massachusetts, in 1847. Operated a drugstore in Lebanon, Kentucky, from 1848 to 1849. Attorney in Lebanon from 1849 to 1872. Commonwealth's attorney for the 5th Judicial District of Kentucky in Marion County from 1862 to 1867.
